CustomField.description: This field will hold the date used for revenue recognition for billing. For a session line the date will be the date of the session, for a material line the date will show the instance start date
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will hold the date used for revenue recognition for billing. For a session line the date will show the date of the actual session, for a material line the date will show the instance start date
CustomField.label: Date
